Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 65th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1967...
Injured on 5/25/1967 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/1/1972 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to NYM: LF C. Lopez. Going to CHC: RF J. Wockenfuss)...
Injured on 6/4/1973 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Released by New York (N) on 6/9/1975...
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1978...
Injured on 8/8/1978 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 6/18/1983 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Dave Righetti (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1985, off Mike Krukow (ATL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 9/5/1985...
Drove in 7 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/28/1986...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1986, hitting .342 with 14 HR, 32 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1986, hitting .609 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/29/1986...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Atlanta on 5/11/1987...
Injured on 7/18/1987 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/30/1987 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 9/24/1988 with a Broken Ribs, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1989, hitting .471 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1990, hitting .458 with 5 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1990, hitting .337 with 9 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/7/1992 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1992...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/11/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1993, hitting .471 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
